ValidationRule.description: This validation rule makes sure that all the fields in the address info is filled
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ((RecordTypeId = "012800000003ZTZ"|| RecordTypeId = '012800000002DoB' || RecordTypeId = '012800000002DoL'), (ISBLANK( MailingCity ) || ISBLANK( MailingState ) || ISBLANK( MailingStreet ) || ISBLANK( MailingPostalCode) || ISBLANK( MailingCountry)),(MailingCountry="CA" || OtherCountry="CA"))
